Description:
Detects creation of new Kubernetes service account, which could indicate an attacker's attempt to persist within a cluster.


Author: Leo Tsaousis (@laripping)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: New Kubernetes Service Account Created
Query: sourcetype='kubernetes-audit' eql select * from _source_ where verb = 'create' and objectref.resource = 'serviceaccounts'
